Key Match Events: Granit Xhaka was sent off in the 84th minute for a late challenge on Kasper Hjulmand.
Patrick Dorgu scored Denmark's winning goal in the 88th minute.
Switzerland's Silvan Widmer and Nico Elvedi received bookings for time-wasting and a last-man foul respectively.
Post-Match Reflections: Joachim Andersen criticized Xhaka's behavior but praised his skill and professionalism.
Xhaka will be suspended for Switzerland's next match against Spain.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was intense with several controversial decisions and high tension between players.
